preprocess_opp module¶

preprocess_opp¶

설명¶

Opportunity 데이터셋의 전처리를 위한 모듈입니다.

preprocess_opp.adjust_idx_labels(data_y, label)¶

Transforms original labels into the range [0, nb_labels-1]

매개변수

  • data_y – numpy integer array Sensor labels

  • label – string, [‘gestures’ (default), ‘locomotion’] Type of activities to be recognized. The OPPORTUNITY dataset includes several annotations to perform recognition modes of locomotion/postures and recognition of sporadic gestures.

반환값

numpy integer array Modified sensor labels

preprocess_opp.check_data(data_set)¶

Try to access to the file and checks if dataset is in the data directory In case the file is not found try to download it from original location

매개변수

data_set – Path with original OPPORTUNITY zip file

반환값

data directory

preprocess_opp.divide_x_y(data, label)¶

Segments each sample into features and label

매개변수

  • data – numpy integer matrix Sensor data

  • label – string, [‘gestures’ (default), ‘locomotion’] Type of activities to be recognized

반환값

numpy integer matrix, numpy integer array Features encapsulated into a matrix and labels as an array

preprocess_opp.generate_data(dataset, target_filename, label)¶

Function to read the OPPORTUNITY challenge raw data and process all sensor channels

매개변수

  • dataset – Path with original OPPORTUNITY zip file

  • target_filename – Processed file

  • label – [‘gestures’ (default), ‘locomotion’] Type of activities to be recognized.

preprocess_opp.get_args()¶

This function parses and return arguments passed in

반환값

dataset, target_filename, label:results of parsing arguments

preprocess_opp.load_dataset(filename)¶

load dataset and process it for training, validation, test

매개변수

filename – string of file name

preprocess_opp.normalize(data, max_list, min_list)¶

Normalizes all sensor channels

매개변수

  • data – numpy integer matrix Sensor data

  • max_list – numpy integer array Array containing maximums values for every one of the 113 sensor channels

  • min_list – numpy integer array Array containing minimum values for every one of the 113 sensor channels

반환값

Normalized sensor data

preprocess_opp.opp_sliding_window(data_x, data_y, ws, ss)¶

Preprocess data using sliding window

매개변수

  • data_x – numpy matrix of feature data

  • data_y – numpy array of label data

  • ws – numpy integer of window size

  • ss – nunmpy interger of step size

반환값

numpy array of data

preprocess_opp.process_dataset_file(data, label)¶

Function defined as a pipeline to process individual OPPORTUNITY files

매개변수

  • data – numpy integer matrix Matrix containing data samples (rows) for every sensor channel (column)

  • label – string, [‘gestures’ (default), ‘locomotion’] Type of activities to be recognized

반환값

numpy integer matrix, numy integer array Processed sensor data, segmented into features (x) and labels (y)

preprocess_opp.refine_data(data)¶

remove rows which have nan values

매개변수

data – data to refine

반환값

data with complete instance without NaN values

preprocess_opp.select_columns_opp(data)¶

Selection of the 77 columns employed in the OPPORTUNITY challenge

매개변수

data – numpy integer matrix. Sensor data (all features)

반환값

numpy integer matrix. Selection of features
